local_intent: verify grasp pose 'grasp_white_plate' then approach white_plate, pick it, transit to red_plate, descend until contact, release, and retreat
assumptions: Gripper is open and empty at subtree start
Perception can confirm white_plate and red_plate
coherence_with_global: Performs the verification (PoseAvailable) and continues the remaining pick-and-place steps consistent with GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: approach, align, pick, verify grasp, move to red_plate, lower until contact, open to release, retreat, and wait. Port values are chosen from provided port_value_spaces.
